name: Mothew Vs The Light
description:
Mothew Vs The Light Made in 72 hours for LD49

You play as Mothew, a moth who is trying to save his fellow mothkind by adventuring out to turn off all the lights in the land. Guided by the crazy ol coot, Mothua, you must venture out to find all the light switches. But beware the alluring pull of the lights between you and your goal, as many a stable moth have been lost to the insanity inducing lights.

Thank you for playing!

Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Run - Shift
  • Jump/Flap - Space
